title: 我每次点击论坛问答区会显示这个咋办
author: engya5077
txt_content:
502 Bad GatewayThe proxy server received an invalid response from an upstream server. Sorry for the inconvenience.
Please report this message and include the following information to us.
Thank you very much!URL:http://www.mcbbs.net/forum-multiqanda-1.htmlServer:mc-slbDate:2017/09/03 17:25:11

replies.author: 水煮清娃
replies.txt_content: 论坛改版之后经常这样，应该是数据库问题,只能等论坛内部优化。搜索的时候也可能造成整个网站假死。

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content: 多刷新几次就好了 论坛就这样
